name: Gunslinger (ITK2)
description:
In the year of 2069 the world has become a western wasteland, where the world has been taken over by the all mighty bull sire. He has sent out his follows to stop you from ending his own perfect world, you will have to hunt the bull sire down and shoot down the pest he throws at you and get revenge for world and your home.

W - UP

A - LEFT

S - DOWN

D - RIGHT

MOVE MOUSE - AIM

LEFT CLICK - SHOOT

R  - RESTART GAME

This is a top down view shooter where you will have to fight enemies in different rooms and find keys in those rooms to continue through to the next rooms. You will have to fight through to get to the portal that will take you to the boss battle where you will have to defeat the boss and save this western world.
